verses.1: Pasian in Noah le a tapate thupha pia a, amaute tungah, “Pung unla, tampi pha-in, leitung dim un.
verses.2: Note pen leitung ganhing khempeuh, huihlak vasa khempeuh, lei lak ah a bokvak khempeuh le tuipi ngasa khempeuh in hong kihta-in hong zahtak ding uh hi. Noteʼ khut sungah tuate hong kipia hi.
verses.3: A nungta a gamtang peuhmah, note adingin an hi ding hi. Kung hing khempeuh ka hong piak bangin na khempeuh zong note kong pia hi.
verses.4: A nuntakna ahi a sisan pen a sa tawh na nekhawm kei bek ding uh hi.
verses.5: Mi khatpeuh in hong thah leh ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that dinga, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi.
verses.6: Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.
verses.7: “Note, pungin khang unla, leitungah tampi tak piang khia-in, tampi pha-in khang un,” a ci hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah le amah tawh a om a tapate kiangah,
verses.9: “En un, note le noteʼ khit a na suanlekhakte uh le,
verses.10: note tawh a om nuntakna a nei peuhmah, vasate, innsate, note tawh a om leitung gamsa peuhmah, teembaw sung panin a paikhia zahzah peuhmah tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi.
verses.11: Nuntakna a nei khempeuh, tuiciin tawh susiakik ngei nawn loin, leitung a susia dingin tuiciin ka tunsakkik ngei nawn loh nadingin note tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi,” a ci hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Hih pen, kei le note le note tawh a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh kikalah mailam khang tawntung ah thuciamna lim ahi hi.
verses.13: Meii sungah ka sakhituihup ka kaisak a, tua pen kei le leitung kikalah thuciamna lim hi ding hi.
verses.14: Vantungah meii kong kaisak ciangin meii sungah sakhituihup a kimuh leh,
verses.15: kei le note le nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding hi. Tuite pen, nuntakna a nei khempeuh a susia ding tuiciin suakkik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
verses.16: Meii sungah sakhituihup a om ciangin keimah in ka en dinga, kei le leitungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh tawntung thuciamna ka phawk ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.17: Pasian in Noah kiangah, “Hih pen, kei le leitungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh ka kipsak sa thuciamna lim ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.18: Teembaw sung panin a paikhia Noahʼ tapate, Shem, Ham le Jafeth ahi hi. Ham pen Kanaanʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.19: Hih Noahʼ tapa thumte panin leitung buppi mi tawh hong kidim hi.
verses.20: Noah pen lo kho masa pa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi.
verses.21: Amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin a lum hi.
verses.22: Kanaanʼ pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pualam a om a sanggam nihte kiangah a gen hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin Shem le Jafeth in puan khat la-in amau tegelʼ liangko tuakah baang uh a, a nung leh lamun pai-in a pa uhʼ guaktang omna a khuh uh hi. Amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh guaktang omna mu lo uh hi.
verses.24: Noah a zukhamna panin a pilvan ciangin ama tungah a tapa Hamʼ gamtatna thei a,
verses.25: amah in, “Kanaan in samsiatna ngah ta henla, a sanggamteʼ sila hi tahen.
verses.26: Topa ka Pasian in Shem thupha pia henla, Kanaan, ama sila hisak hen.
verses.27: Pasian in Jafeth pungsak henla, Shemʼ puanbukte sungah amah tengsak hen. Kanaan ama sila hisak hen,” a ci hi.
verses.28: Tuiciin a tun khit ciangin Noah kum za thum le kum sawm nga nungta hi.
verses.29: Noahʼ khan sungteng pen kum za kua le kum sawm nga hi a, tua ciangin amah a si hi.
